title: 95/295/EC: Commission Decision of 26 July 1995 amending Decisions 92/325/EEC and 93/242/EEC as regards certain protection measures in relation to foot-and-mouth disease in certain European countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 July 1995 amending Decisions 92/325/EEC and 93/242/EEC as regards certain protection measures in relation to foot-and-mouth disease in certain European countries (Text with EEA relevance) (95/295/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Annexes A, B, C and D, Section V, point 1 to Decision 92/325/EEC '(excluding the district of Hasskovo)` is deleted.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
